task_details: Gather data, analyze performance metrics, and create a comprehensive weekly report for management.
Schedule and conduct a client meeting to discuss project progress and address any concerns.
Take a break and have lunch.
Participate in a code review session to provide feedback and ensure code quality.
Identify and fix critical bugs reported by QA testers.
Attend a team meeting to discuss project milestones and plan upcoming tasks.
Allocate time for researching new technologies and prototyping new features.
Update project documentation, including user manuals and API documentation.
Conduct thorough testing of new software features and report defects.
Review completed tasks, plan for the next day, and wrap up loose ends.
